entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: Ambo now a tropical depression; may exit PAR on Monday

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: Ambo now a tropical depression; may exit PAR on Monday
media:group.media:description:
Ambo was reclassified a tropical depression even as it headed north-northeastward over the Luzon strait, PAGASA announced Saturday evening.

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: May 16, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Sabado, May 16, 2020:
-Latest sa Bagyong Ambo
-Traffic situation sa ilang bahagi ng bansa
-Ilang bahagi ng Cabanatuan, binaha dahil sa Bagyong Ambo
-Bagyong Ambo 5 p.m. bulletin
-Mga kalsada, bahay at taniman, naperwisyo ng baha; halos buong Aurora, nawalan ng kuryente
-PDu30, umuwi sa kaniyang pamilya mahigit 2 buwan matapos ipatupad ang ECQ sa NCR
-Traffic sa EDSA-Balintawak pa-NLEX, bumigat dahil sa dagsa ng mga motoristang pa-probinsiya
-Anti-COVID-19 protocol, ipinatutupad sa pagbabalik-operasyon ng mga mall
-Mabigat na daloy ng trapiko at operasyon ng mga negosyo sa Cavite, nagbalik na matapos ipatupad ang GCQ
-Dennis Trillo, nag-share ng video ng cute duet nila ng birthday girl na si Jennylyn Mercado
-Bahay ng internet sensation na si "Miss Everything", winasak ng Bagyong Ambo
-Bumper to bumper na traffic, naranasan ngayong unang araw ng modified enhanced community quarantine
-Check-in location na "Philippines, province of China," binatikos ng ilang netizen
-Art Angel, muling mapapanood sa GMA Network tuwing M-W-F, 8:25 a.m.
For Kapuso abroad, subscribe to GMA Pinoy TV (http://www.gmapinoytv.com/) for GMA programs, including the full version of 24 Oras Weekend.
24 Oras Weekend is anchored by Ivan Mayrina and Pia Arcangel, featuring top news stories from the Philippines. Visit GMA News Online (http://www.gmanews.tv/24Oras) for more.

entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: P/Lt. Gen. Eleazar inspects Metro Manila areas on first day of MECQ

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: P/Lt. Gen. Eleazar inspects Metro Manila areas on first day of MECQ
media:group.media:description:
Nag-ikot si Joint Task Force COVID Shield Commander P/Lt. Gen. Guillermo Eleazar sa ilang lugar sa Metro Manila ngayong unang araw ng modified enhanced community quarantine.
